item.title: Opinion Poll by Behaviour and Attitudes for The Sunday Times, 5–17 July 2018 – Seat Projections for the Parties
item.description:
• Fine Gael (EPP): 4–7 seats
  • Fianna Fáil (ALDE): 1–4 seats
  • Sinn Féin (GUE/NGL): 3–4 seats
  • Labour Party (S&D): 0 seats
  • Solidarity–People Before Profit (GUE/NGL): 0 seats
  • Social Democrats (*): 0 seats
  • Green Party (Greens/EFA): 0 seats
  • Renua Ireland (*): 0 seats
  • Independent Alliance (*): 0 seats
  • Independents (GUE/NGL): 0–1 seats

item.title: Opinion Poll by Behaviour and Attitudes for The Sunday Times, 5–17 July 2018 – Seat Projections for a Selection of Coalitions
Opinion Poll by Behaviour and Attitudes for The Sunday Times, 5–17 July 2018 – Voting Intentions
item.description:
• Fine Gael (EPP): 31.6–37.7%
  • Fianna Fáil (ALDE): 18.9–24.1%
  • Sinn Féin (GUE/NGL): 19.8–25.1%
  • Labour Party (S&D): 2.1–4.3%
  • Solidarity–People Before Profit (GUE/NGL): 0.5–1.8%
  • Social Democrats (*): 0.5–1.8%
  • Green Party (Greens/EFA): 1.3–3.2%
  • Renua Ireland (*): 0.1–0.8%
  • Independent Alliance (*): 3.0–5.6%
  • Independents (GUE/NGL): 6.8–10.3%
